alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 3:58PM MST until November 10 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 7500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, bringing total snow accumulations up to 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
